org.aeonium.fxunit

Class FXHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aeonium.fxunit.FXHelper

  • public final class FXHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for UI testing.

    • Method Detail

      • clearText

        public static void clearText(javafx.scene.control.Labeled labeled)
        Clear the text of a Labeled component, i.e., set it to an empty string.
        Parameters:
        labeled - The component, must be an instance or descendant of Labeled.

      • findTab

        public static javafx.scene.control.Tab findTab(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane,
                                               java.lang.String id)
        Find a tab sheet by ID in the given tab pane.
        Parameters:
        tabPane - The tab pane.
        id - The id.
        Returns:
        The tab with the given ID.

      • focus

        public static void focus(javafx.scene.Node node)
        Request the focus for a given node and ensure that this happens on the JavaFX Application Thread. After this, delay further actions by the specified delay time delay
        Parameters:
        node - The node to request the focus for.

      • invokeOnFXThread

        public static void invokeOnFXThread(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Ensure that the given runnable gets executed on the JavaFX applcation thread.
        Parameters:
        runnable - Runnable that contains the code to be executed on the JavaFX thread.

      • runAndWait

        public static void runAndWait(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
                       throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        If the current thread is the JavaFX Application thread, run the code of the given runnable on the current thread, i.e., invoke it's run() method directly, otherwise put it on the JavaFX Application thread and wait for completion of this task.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The code to run on the JavaFX Application thread
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - In case of an error in the executing task.

      • selectTab

        public static void selectTab(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane,
                             java.lang.String id)

      • shutdownStage

        public static void shutdownStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Shut down a test stage, i.e., hide it an release it's content.
        Parameters:
        stage - The stage to be closed.

      • typeKey

        public static void typeKey(javafx.scene.Node target,
                           java.lang.String t)
        Send key events to the target node that simulate the typing of the given character sequence.
        Parameters:
        target - The target node
        t - The character sequence

      • typeKey

        public static void typeKey(javafx.scene.Node target,
                           java.lang.Character c)
        Send key events to the target node that simulate the typing of the given character.
        Parameters:
        target - The target node
        c - The character
